rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 8-Final #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 2:00 PM, 12 June 2025(Thursday)



Light to moderate rains was observed over Zambales for the past 3 hours. With this development all RAINFALL WARNING in this area is now terminated.Meanwhile, expect light to moderate rains over Metro Manila, Rizal, Laguna, Batangas, Nueva Ecija, Tarlac and Cavite within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate rains affecting Quezon, Bataan, Bulacan and Pampanga which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are still advised to MONITOR the weather condition.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
